::Tasmanian Kid::
TK drowzilly opened his eyes, and realized he was being restrained by 
Manterror. He looked back at Manterror, then with his right leg, kicked 
Injector ahem, where the sun don't shine. He then dug his claws into 
manterror's chest, and sent sevral thousand volts of electricity into him, 
hoping to knock him out. finally, he spit mech fluid in doublepunches face, 
hoping that would somewhat disable him.


>From: KSLawdogg@...

>
>Injector/Manterror/Double Punch:
>
>
>Injector got to his feet, walking over to TK.  "You'll pay for your theft,
>and actions, cyber-punk!" hey yelled, sending a hard kick to the right side
>of TK's head.
>
>Double Punch stepped up next to Injector kicking at TK's right side.
>
>Manterror fired off an ion disk at TK's left knee, picking him up and 
>putting
>him to his feet, holding him up, keeping his arms restrained.
>
>(TK, I don't mean to post for you with the grabbing of your character, just
>to merely save time.  If you'd like to do something to Manterror when he
>tries to grab you, you roll out, or something like that, go ahead and tell 
>me)
